text: mariyu varu: "Okavela ma vaddaku adbhuta sucana (mahima) vaste, memu tappaka visvasistamu." Ani allah peruto gatti pramanalu cestaru. Varito anu: "Niscayanga, adbhuta sucanalu (mahimalu) allah vasanlone unnayi. Okavela avi (adbhuta sucanalu) vaccina, varu visvasincarani (o muslimulara!) Miku e vidhanga grahimpajeyali
